org.springframework.session.soss

Class ScaleoutSessionRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.session.soss.ScaleoutSessionRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.session.FindByIndexNameSessionRepository<ScaleoutSession>, org.springframework.session.SessionRepository<ScaleoutSession>

    public class ScaleoutSessionRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.session.FindByIndexNameSessionRepository<ScaleoutSession>
    A SessionRepository implementation that is backed by ScaleOut StateServer's NamedCache API. This implementation does not support publishing events.

    Integrating with the ScaleoutSessionRepository is very easy. Inside your application code, simply add a basic configuration class with the EnableScaleoutHttpSession annotation.

    Optionally, you can set the cache name and the timeout for sessions. By default, the cache name used is "SpringSessionRepo" and the session timeout is 30 minutes and locking is enabled.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScaleoutSessionRepository

        public ScaleoutSessionRepository(java.lang.String cacheName,
                                 java.time.Duration maxInactiveTime,
                                 boolean useLocking,
                                 java.lang.String remoteStoreName,
                                 int remoteReadPendingInterval,
                                 int remoteReadRetries)
        Instantiates the ScaleOutSessionRepository.
        Parameters:
        cacheName - the cache name to store ScaleoutSessions
        maxInactiveTime - the max inactive time of a session
        useLocking - if the scaleout repository is using locking
        remoteStoreName - the name of the remote store (used for GeoServer Pro pull replication).
        remoteReadPendingInterval - in case of a WAN failure, the interval in ms to wait when a remote read is pending
        remoteReadRetries - in case of a WAN failure, the number of times to retry a remote read
